content:
Russian Attak troops attacked Odessa with Baltic Studies during the visit of President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky and the premiere of Greece Kiriakos Michokotakis on March 6.

Volodymyr Zelenskyy told about it ininterviewItalian TV channel RAI 1.

“We were with the Prime Minister of Greece, he had an official visit to Odessa. We were in the port. So, in several hundred, 300-400 meters was a blow to a ballistic missile. The rocket came very quickly, - said Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

According to the President, the Baltic Stroke was inflicted from the territory of the temporarily occupied Crimea, so the alert of the air threat did not work in time.

“I do not know who this blow was. In any case, it is, honestly, something incredible when we have a prime minister of another country, I am not talking about myself. I am just about respecting the leaders of other states and people from other states. From Russia and Putin there is simply no, ”Zelensky said.

As reported by the Armyinform, on March 6, Prime Minister of Greece Kiriakos Michotakis came to Odessa.

Hemetwith President of Ukraine Vladimir Zelensky,VisitedRussia destroyed by the Transfiguration Cathedral and inspected the work of the Odessa Sea Commercial Port.
title: Volodymyr Zelensky told about Russian firing Baltic Studies during a meeting in Odessa with Greece Prime Minister
